content.question: All of the following are consequences of the federal system in the United States EXCEPT

choices.label: inequality in government services across subnational entities
opportunities for experimentation in government programs
multiple points of access for interest groups
a strict division of power among levels of government

content.answer: a strict division of power among levels of government

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
